title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical tests when the criminal mastermind called the Joker wreaks havoc.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, Watergate and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where he clashes with an abusive instructor.

title: La La Land
plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: The Social Network
plot: The founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed are dramatized.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring with a fellowship of allies.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Avatar
plot: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: Titanic
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Prestige
plot: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: Toy Story
plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
